Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1986...
Injured on 7/19/1989 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 6/23/1992, off Xavier Hernandez (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/27/1992, off Doug Henry (NYY)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1993, hitting .293 with 31 HR, 111 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/26/1994...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 7/17/1995...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/9/1998 to a 3-year deal worth $1,950,000 per year...
